text: Ate asim' tuhade tom pahilam jihare vi rasula ate paigabara bheje ta jadom' unham ne kujha parhi'a tam saitana ne unham de parhe ga'e vica milavata kara diti. Alaha phira saitana di kiti milavata nu dura kara cida hai. Phira alaha apani'am a'itam nu dhaka kara dida hai. Alaha gi'ana vala ate bibeka vala hai
